text.game.bossbar.chest_loot: Please wait while loot is generated...
text.game.deathmatch.begin: The border has stopped shrinking! The game will end in %s seconds.
text.game.border.shrink: The border has begun to shrink!
text.game.combat.punish: %s tried to combat log and was punished for it!
text.game.title.subtitle: Your position:
text.game.end.time: Times up! The game has ended in a draw.
text.game.end.unexpected: The game was prematurely ended. All players have been returned to the lobby.
text.game.pvp_grace.end: The grace period has expired! PvP is now enabled!
text.game.oob.title: Out of Bounds
text.game.oob.subtitle: Please return to play area
text.game.begin: The barriers have dropped! A %s second grace period has been applied!
text.game.spectator.overflow: Maximum player count has been reached, you were automatically moved to the spectators.
text.lobby.start.begin: Start countdown has begun! Game will begin in %s seconds.
text.lobby.start.warn.min_players: Warning! Only 1 player detected! Cancel the countdown now if you wish to have more players!
text.lobby.start.warn.max_players: Warning! Maximum number of players is %s! Excess players will be forced to spectate!
text.lobby.start.error.no_players: At least one player must be ready before starting the game!
text.lobby.teams.random: You will be assigned a random team at the start of the match!
text.lobby.teams.full: That team is full! Please choose a different team to join.
text.lobby.teams.countdown_in_progress: Start countdown is in progress! You cannot change teams at this time.
text.lobby.teams.already_on_team: You are already on that team!
text.lobby.teams.item.team.name: %s's Team
text.lobby.teams.item.team.lore: Click here to join the team
text.lobby.teams.item.ready.name: READY
text.lobby.teams.item.ready.lore: Indicates that you are ready to start the game
text.lobby.teams.item.spectator.name: SPECTATOR
text.lobby.teams.item.spectator.lore: Indicates that you wish to spectate the upcoming match
text.lobby.teams.item.new.name: NEW TEAM
text.lobby.teams.item.random.name: RANDOM
text.lobby.teams.item.random.lore: Assigns you a random team when the game begins
text.lobby.teams.disband.leader_leave: Your team was disbanded because the leader has left.
text.lobby.teams.disband.size_changed: Your team was disbanded because the team options were changed.
text.lobby.arena.sword.name: Training Sword
text.lobby.teleporter.name: Personal Teleporter
text.lobby.options.display.reset.name: Reset Options
text.lobby.options.actions.lock.lock: Game options have been locked! Only you and/or admins can modify them.
text.lobby.options.actions.lock.auto_unl: The game options have automatically been unlocked because there are no admins online.
text.lobby.options.actions.lock.grant_pe: You may now edit the game options!
text.lobby.options.actions.lock.unlock: All players may now edit the game options.
text.lobby.options.actions.lock.no_permi: You do not have permission to edit the game options at this time. %s to give yourself permission.
text.lobby.options.actions.reset: All options have been reset to their default values.
text.admin.chest.error.restock_in_progre: New restock cannot be started, another one is already in progress.
